title: By the King, a proclamation for the meeting of the Parliament
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James II)
publisher: Printed by the assigns of John Bill, deceas'd, and by Henry Hills, and Thomas Newcomb ...,
notes: "Given at our court at Whitehall the eleventh day of October, 1685..."
